replies.body:
E - Event Horizon
DO NOT PASS GO Enemy dashes through Event Horizon's walls will stop at them instead
---
Please add new Veigar Greybeard interaction when a champion dashes into his wall, **"You shall not pass!"**, and one when he dies near his team **"Fly, you fools!"**
Don't you mean run?
No. That's not what he says.
he says run you fools in the books, but in the movie he says fly you fools... dramatic effect i guess...
Actually, I pulled it out to check. He also says "Fly" in the book. Book Two, Chapter "Bridge of Khazad-dum", last page.

Does anyone else have an issue with the automatic pathway (not sure how to word it) when going through base gates. If I right-click far out of the map at the start of the game and my champion routes itself through a base gate, it twitches while walking through it. Just me?

Nah man i know what you mean man i have noticed when i watch my champ walk through the gate about half way through he/she take a quick detour to the left or right, like they are trying to avoid something. Its not much but if more people notice this it would be a small but nice fix.
It's not just you, sometimes walking out of the gate makes your champion look like it's glitching between animation frames or something.

If you look super closely, you can see that the pathing is broken for the base gates. The white pathing line on the minimap actually makes a super tiny zig-zag at the center of the gates. Imho, this should be fixed as soon as possible. If this issue didn't exist, many deaths would be avoided. However, I'm sure there's a logical reason behind it. Maybe due to the vision blocker it has like wall and jungle terrain has?
Athene is back to normal. {{champion:103}}{{champion:63}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:161}}  Age of mages has returned!!!!

no it isn't they removed Ludens Echo.. I don't get why they have to make a functional build path for it, sounds like an excuse to make an empty promise of it returning considering it was already good as is.
They only removed it on Twisted Treeline and Crystal Scar
Better nerf Irelia
Goodbye AP Irelia, we will miss you {{item:3070}}
If you're not going to nerf Nidalee, at least fix her invisible spears, or make them invisible altogether as "intended design" so at least we're aware of invisible hitboxes draining half our HP.
OMG, finally a {{champion:133}} fix! I'm so happy! :D
Where are the bugfixes on Azir?
azir is just complicated
{{champion:268}}  is a birbfather with a complicated relationship with his birbdaughter {{champion:15}}
When are we going to get 4 bans in champ select?
when you learn to play
{{champion:63}}Ooo that's gotta burn

{{champion:28}} ULTRA RAPID FRENZY: Spell hits now lower Dark Frenzy's cooldown by 1 second

Urf confirmed.
Ty for not straight up gutting {{champion:113}}  Riot!
These changes will separate the "{{champion:113}} is OP, so I'll play her" people from the "I'm good at {{champion:113}}, so I'll play her" people

I think they should have decreased the on-hit damage even more, but put significantly more damage into the spin part of her W.  As a tank it would make more sense to have stronger damage over time instead of the burst of the initial autoattack
Do my eyes deceive me? IS THAT AN AATROX BUFF?! PRAISE THE BUFF BARDGE! {{champion:266}} <3
Rito, what happened to Sion Trampling faces with ulti? {{champion:14}}
WHY AREN'T THE HOT SKINS LISTED!?!
Dude,don't spoil the surprise.
Surprise? You mean the party that {{champion:32}} wasn't invited to? XD

Meanwhile with someone who doesn't follow the PBE
"WTF are these guys talking about?I want me some badass,serious,no-joke skins!"
Well if people are looking for no-joke they might want to look at today's announcement... cause dat {{champion:17}} is no joke!
Riot, you missed the chance to put in the phrase "NONE SHALL NOT PASS" for Veigar for his E.
"YOU SHALL NOT PASS!" -{{champion:45}} Greybeard
luden's has been removed..... but it was such a good starting item for me :'(
removed only on treeline, where it cant even be finished due to needlessly large rod not existing.

{{champion:28}} The Evelynn changes don't make any sense to me; since the E changes/meta shift, her most viable build path is bruiser. Her stickiness is her best asset and you're... nerfing it while making well-timed Dark Frenzy usage less important (Eve is already extremely easy mechanically).

Even thematically, you're adding a cooldown reduction to an ability that already has a reset on kill - it just doesn't make any sense.
Finally a {{champion:133}} Buff! I'm really happy my favorite champion is getting tweaked. Hope to see more of them soonly! And congradulations, this is a wonderful patch!
that scuttle crab vison nerf....{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Athene's buff? {{champion:50}}...Oh fuck, he is going to gain 39% of his mana from a kill or assist.
As a Swain lover: ahahahaa. Ahhahahahahaaa. AHAHAHAHAAHAHHAHHA
Nice to see Galio getting a buff but hes bad enough on mana that a cooldown reduction doesn't mean much. Could have 0 cd but still doesn't matter if you have no mana
LOL ok RIP ludens echo ALREADY I would say "you will be missed" but it didn't get enough time to leave an impact
I think it's just for Twisted Treeline.

Lol what the fuck is reading comprehension. 

This motherfucker failed the literacy test.
lol
URF???

Rito just made a lot of Quinn players very happy. Well, I should probably say all 3 Quinn players including me happy.
On a serious note, those E fixes are perfect, they were pretty much the only things I had a problem with on her. Other than the ridiculously awful Blind mechanics, but that's a problem with the form of CC its self, not Quinn.

{{champion:238}} I have this Zed bug where the Q's from the shadows don't always do dmg. THey pass through people and don't do any dmg whatsoever and i dont think they notice it because its still happening often
